game.name: Craft Sharp Shooter
game.description:
The biggest action-packed challenge has come to you today where only the best would survive till the end. Do you think that your intense fighting abilities can challenge anyone? Join Craft Sharp Shooter and get ready to show off your wildest action skills! Grab your weapon and be prepared to finish all the enemies that come on your way! Shoot them before they attack and send you to the hell! Your instant action taking power, quick reflexes and viable shooting abilities will help you to survive through all the levels. 
You are not alone as you are lashed with the strong weapons and an ability to move all across the area and find your enemies. When you click the play button, you would find yourself in a blocky world where plenty of people are already roaming here and there. Finish as many as you can to grab the bonuses and upgrade your weapons in this html5 war game! Do not forget to collect the weapons that you see on the screen. 
Use a virtual block shelter to become the best shooter of the virtual world! Be careful and try to shoot at other players and grab blood packets from them to boost your health! You also have to take care of grabbing the props on the map to make your character stronger than before in this multiplayer infinite shooter game. Use the mouse on desktop and tap the screen on mobile phone to move your character! Keyboard will also help you to finish all the levels. Good luck to try more tricky action-packed challenges on atmegame.com and have fun without download!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Craft Sharp Shooter at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Shooting games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.webControlKeys: W,A,S,D ALLARROWS TO MOVE, SPACE-JUMP, L CLICK-SHOOT
